attributes.action: Enact a law requiring serving members of parliament to wear an easily recognised uniform
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Such a uniform, perhaps in party colours, will allow them, as public servants, to be easily recognised when in public places. It will allow them to experience at first hand the animosity or acclaim that other uniformed public servants such as fireman, nurses, police officers or service personnel experience.
Uniforms will also allow the display of trinkets that they are awarded and perhaps good conduct badges when they tow the party line.

rejection.details: This would be a matter for Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
